title: Disconnecting Issues on Macbook Pro
body:
I keep disconnecting from the game every 10 minutes or so. Literally impossible to play on my macbook pro. The ping would spike up to 500 and then i would disconnect for around 20-30 seconds then reconnect again. Sometimes it doesn't connect at all. Both my brothers play on a Windows PC and they do not have this issue. So I'm guessing it's not a wifi problem. Can anyone please help me fix this?? 

Specs:
MacBook Pro (13-inch, Late 2011)
Processor: 2.4 gHz Intel Core i5
Memory: 4 GB 1333 MHz DDR3
Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 384 MB
OS X El Capitan 10.11.6

replies.body:
League requires a really stable connection and the Mac client is particularly sensitive to network inconsistencies. Most latency (ping) issues are caused by local network settings that don't play nicely with League, so I suggest working through our [mac connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) as a first step.

Let me know if those steps yielded any positive results.
